titles.title: Defense Acquisition Contractor Workforce Improvement Act of 2015

A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the inclusion of certain contractor personnel in matters on the defense acquisition workforce in the annual strategic workforce plan of the Department of Defense.
Defense Acquisition Contractor Workforce Improvement Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Defense Acquisition Contractor Workforce Improvement Act of 2015
This bill includes certain contractor personnel in the defense acquisition workforce for purposes of the Department of Defense annual strategic workforce plan.
